trans-unit.source: Debugging, testing, and performance
trans-unit.target: Debugging, testing, and performance

trans-unit.source: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132)
trans-unit.target: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132)

trans-unit.source: Use Microsoft Visual Studio to debug and test your app.
trans-unit.target: Use Microsoft Visual Studio to debug and test your app.

trans-unit.source: To prepare your app for the Windows Store certification process, use the Windows App Certification Kit.
trans-unit.target: To prepare your app for the Windows Store certification process, use the Windows App Certification Kit.

trans-unit.source: Topic
trans-unit.target: Topic

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Deploying and debugging UWP apps
trans-unit.target: Deploying and debugging UWP apps

trans-unit.source: This article guides you through the steps to target various deployment and debugging targets.
trans-unit.target: This article guides you through the steps to target various deployment and debugging targets.

trans-unit.source: Test with the Microsoft Emulator for Windows 10 Mobile
trans-unit.target: Test with the Microsoft Emulator for Windows 10 Mobile

trans-unit.source: Simulate real-world interaction with a device and test the features of your app by using the tools included with Microsoft Emulator for Windows 10 Mobile.
trans-unit.target: Simulate real-world interaction with a device and test the features of your app by using the tools included with Microsoft Emulator for Windows 10 Mobile.

trans-unit.source: The emulator is a desktop application that emulates a mobile device running Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: The emulator is a desktop application that emulates a mobile device running Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: It provides a virtualized environment in which you can debug and test Windows apps without a physical device.
trans-unit.target: It provides a virtualized environment in which you can debug and test Windows apps without a physical device.

trans-unit.source: It also provides an isolated environment for your application prototypes.
trans-unit.target: It also provides an isolated environment for your application prototypes.

trans-unit.source: Beta testing
trans-unit.target: Beta testing

trans-unit.source: **Beta testing** gives you the chance to improve your app based on feedback from individuals outside of your app-development team who try your unreleased app on their own devices.
trans-unit.target: **Beta testing** gives you the chance to improve your app based on feedback from individuals outside of your app-development team who try your unreleased app on their own devices.

trans-unit.source: Windows App Certification Kit
trans-unit.target: Windows App Certification Kit

trans-unit.source: To give your app the best chance of being [Windows App Certification Kit](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=309666).
trans-unit.target: To give your app the best chance of being [Windows App Certification Kit](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=309666).

trans-unit.source: Performance
trans-unit.target: Performance

trans-unit.source: Users expect their apps to remain responsive, to feel natural, and not to drain their battery.
trans-unit.target: Users expect their apps to remain responsive, to feel natural, and not to drain their battery.

trans-unit.source: Technically, performance is a non-functional requirement but treating performance as a feature will help you deliver on your users' expectations.
trans-unit.target: Technically, performance is a non-functional requirement but treating performance as a feature will help you deliver on your users' expectations.

trans-unit.source: Specifying goals, and measuring, are key factors.
trans-unit.target: Specifying goals, and measuring, are key factors.

trans-unit.source: Determine what your performance-critical scenarios are; define what good performance mean.
trans-unit.target: Determine what your performance-critical scenarios are; define what good performance mean.

trans-unit.source: Then measure early and often enough throughout the lifecycle of your project to be confident you'll hit your goals.
trans-unit.target: Then measure early and often enough throughout the lifecycle of your project to be confident you'll hit your goals.
